name: RxKeeper
0:
”Alexa, Open My RxKeeper”
”Alexa, Ask My RxKeeper”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my r. x. keeper
Developer Terms of Use
des:
RxKeeper® is a solution to tackle the costliest health problem in America: Medication Adherence. This product will seamlessly integrate into users' lives and encourage them to take control of their health. We plan to influence positive human behavior to increase medication adherence by using sensors and smart notifications (Push, Email, SMS, Voice, Smart speakers, Smart bulbs).

This is an Alexa skill that replies to the user about medication time, medication reminders, and the status of medication compliance.
Try asking questions like, when did I take my last medication? or did I miss my medication today? Or When is my next medication time?

RxKeeper App and Skill does not provide medical advice, diagnoses, or medical treatment options. The RxKeeper App and Voice Notification system are intended to be used as a secondary medication management system that can be customized for each user. It is not the primary tool for determining whether and when to take medication. You should consult your healthcare providers and make your medical decisions based upon their advice. Always follow your physician's prescription instructions. Please confirm the answers to your Alexa queries by checking your pillboxes or weekly pill organizer case.
